__e: I have everyone who's ever written or blogged about it.
Anyhow, my dad thinks that running a blog about how your dad is on you to get a real job isn't a real job.
But what about his job and all of his friends and his Brooklyn-based pizza blog?
Uh, it was wrong of me to... Post on my blog about your mother's affair.
You must be very, very busy, What with your food blog and...
It was only last week when the lawyer said something to Mum about the blog, and I realised they were trying to pin that on you too.
I read your blog, and while you do a pretty good me, you're not the real deal.
Well, perhaps I could stop by your research station as part of my investigation. I, uh... I often watch your blog and I think we have a lot in common.
